mapper.select: SELECT c.c_id, c.c_senid, c.c_recid, c.c_accept, chat_log_sub.cl_id, chat_log_sub.cl_senid, chat_log_sub.cl_log, chat_log_sub.cl_sentime, chat_log_sub.cl_ruread FROM CHAT c LEFT JOIN (SELECT cl1.cl_c_id, cl1.cl_id, cl1.cl_senid, cl1.cl_log, cl1.cl_sentime, cl1.cl_ruread FROM CHATLOG cl1 JOIN (SELECT cl_c_id, MAX(cl_sentime) AS max_sentime FROM CHATLOG GROUP BY cl_c_id) cl2 ON cl1.cl_c_id = cl2.cl_c_id AND cl1.cl_sentime = cl2.max_sentime) chat_log_sub ON c.c_id = chat_log_sub.cl_c_id WHERE c.c_senid = #{u_id} OR c.c_recid = #{u_id}

SELECT c.c_id, c.c_senid, c.c_recid, c.c_accept, chat_log_sub.cl_id, chat_log_sub.cl_senid, chat_log_sub.cl_log, chat_log_sub.cl_sentime, chat_log_sub.cl_ruread FROM CHAT c LEFT JOIN (SELECT cl1.cl_c_id, cl1.cl_id, cl1.cl_senid, cl1.cl_log, cl1.cl_sentime, cl1.cl_ruread FROM CHATLOG cl1 JOIN (SELECT cl_c_id, MAX(cl_sentime) AS max_sentime FROM CHATLOG GROUP BY cl_c_id) cl2 ON cl1.cl_c_id = cl2.cl_c_id AND cl1.cl_sentime = cl2.max_sentime) chat_log_sub ON c.c_id = chat_log_sub.cl_c_id WHERE c.c_recid = #{u_id}
